extendedInfo.description: ** IF YOU ENJOY THIS APP PLEASE CHECK OUT MY NEWLY RELEASED CONVERT EVERYTHING APP  **As seen on Lifehacker: "Extensive Notes Is a Ridiculously Full Featured Note-Taking App for Android"** Look for Extensive Notes in the October print edition of Inc. Magazine ** ** If you prefer a more simplistic interface check out classic notes **Features:* Note various questions and answers via media tools* Unit converter - Convert length, area, planetary age and weight, liquid volume, time, bandwidth, temperature, flow rate, fuel, power, energy, acceleration, pressure, circular* Ohms law calculator* Decibels of change calculator* Artist image lookup* BMI Calculator* Random password generator* Note attachments such as PDF, word, Powerpoint and so on using extensive notes notepad* Extensive notes notepad can also easily import notes via SD card & web URL* Note qr codes and barcode Notes* Extensive notes notepad can easily import CSV files as todo* Import Contacts in the form of to-do tasks* Export notes as text* Note and lookup slang terms* Note and look various word questions and answers* Easily export the entire note database to SD card which allows for easily going from free to pro version or as a simple means of backup.* Import/Restore notes database via SD* Text-to-Speech (TTS) which allows for notes to be read back to you.* With extensive notes notepad you can also prioritize notes according to you and the order of importance within your everyday life* Extensive notes notepad also allows for you to easily share notes socially such as through Facebook, twitter, or via e-mail, SMS, etc* Sort notes for easier filtering* Search notes for keywords or via hash tags* Extensive notes notepad also allows for Geotagging of notes to remember locations and also allows for looking up street address if available using the longitude and latitude.* Support for multiple audio notes * Support for multiple video notes* Support for multiple image notes* Various calculators such as sales tax calculator, discount calculator, temperature calculator, mortgage calculator, tip calculator and so on. * Support for paint notes* Attach multiple note files * Attach images to notes via Gallery* Attach images to notes via Camera* Attach mp3s and other audio to notes* Attach avis and other video to notes* Private notes - Lock notes so no one can read them* Login screen* Paint notes - Draw notes using your finger* Stick notes to status bar* Comment support - Add comments to existing notes. * Sub notes support* Auto-save note features* Auto Backup * Folder Support* Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR)* Body Fat* Body Mass Index (BMI)* Daily Caloric Intake* Max Heart Rate* One Rep Max (1RM)* Target Heart Rate* Waist To Hip Ratio* Water Intake* Notepad features nearly 100 different notes icons so you can customize statusbar notes to your liking rather than be restricted to a single icon. * Support for notes shortcuts to home screen* Support for notes alarms and reminders using the built in system or using Google calendar.* Extensive notes also has todo / to-do support* Note Web accounts* Note Stopwatch values* Note Thesaurus values - Using the thesaurus tool you can easily find similar words.* Multiple thesaurus providers- BigHugeLabs.com- Abbreviations.com- Dictionary.com* Note Dictionary definitions* Multiple dictionary providers- Dictionary.com- Wordnik- WordNet- Abbreviations.com* Note and lookup Abbreviations* Note and lookup various postal codes* Note various conversions* Note and convert temperature, weight, height and more* Note related words* Note New York Times NewsWire articles* Note Digg headlines* Note and lookup slang words* Note Word suggestions* Note Word usage examples* Conversions - convert between various values* Checklist & todo* Shopping list & grocery list* Adjust notes image size - choose between small or large note images

reviews.title: Good but doesn\'t back up properly
reviews.comment: This app is great but once you back it up you can\'t update the back up again. It will override your current version with the old one.
reviews.author: Julie H

reviews.title: Impressive but could go further
reviews.comment: This is a great app as is, but I would really like to see it have a speech to text note capability rather than just recording audio notes. If it had that, it would be the perfect notes app hands down. Still though, it\'s very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesomely good!
reviews.comment: Simply one of the best free app around!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AMAZING app
reviews.comment: This app has run smooth on both my other tabs and going on my second android based cell. FULL of functionality and tools to use. Way beyond what I expected before I bought it. Easy to use and easy to backup and restore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No setting adjustments unless you pay
reviews.comment: Ridiculously small font - and I\'ve got 2020 vision! Every time you click settings it tries to sell you paid version. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesomely awesome
reviews.comment: Excellent. Has so many great features, intuitive folder organization. I love it. And the developer is quick to respond. Bought!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Purchased pro in 5 minutes
reviews.comment: I have tried so many note apps and liked some of them but this is my final choice. The description sounds like there is too much but it is SO well organized and easy to use. From someone that rarely purchases apps and is hard to impress, try this app it is with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: closest equiv to palm pilot pda notes
reviews.comment: (free ver) can individual notes be transferred to another device via bluetooth if both devices are running this app? would like strong encryption option for individual notes and folders. this is a great pda style app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can do better
reviews.comment: Will be great if you could link this app with EVERNOTE. That\'s a straight up 5star
reviews.author: Slicker STK

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I like the categories that this app is set up with; notes, accounts, to do, and folders. It allows quick access (accounts are password secure too) to saved information.  This app has become one of my most used programs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: liked until force closed shopping list
reviews.comment: I really liked it until it force closed when I tried to reopen a shopping list and continued to force close every time I tried after. shopping list isn\'t any good if you can\'t see it to shop by.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cross Referencing Notepad
reviews.comment: This notepad is so flexible when it comes to cross referencing something. It can fetch information online quickly. \342\231\245
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Functionally great, but lacks usability.
reviews.comment: Guys, do a UCD review: minimize number of taps for typical use cases, make fonts scalable, add a dark theme etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite note app...
reviews.comment: This spp has so much to offer. Audio, text, draw, etc. I love it! Easy to use and let\'s you back up notes to your SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Most awesome note app I\'ve uses. Quite comprehensive, neat toolkit, minimalist UI, love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was about to purchase when the To Do list forced a close. looks like a very good prog. but no way to recover from a continuous crash. HTC Thundbolt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I finally found an app I could create and print without having to connect to a cloud printer. I\'m using this on my Motorola xoom tablet with my regular printer. Love it love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Holy Note-Taking, Batman!
reviews.comment: This app does everything but wash the dishes, & if you had a waterproof office, it probably would wash the dishes! I will switch to this exclusively! Bye, bye Evernote! Conversions, weather, calculations, & I haven\'t even bought the Pro version yet! I just DON\'T buy apps, but thus is an exception!
reviews.author: Angie Hipp

reviews.title: Essential!
reviews.comment: I never scramble for a notepad and pen anymore. When a form doesn\'t work, I type a note and copy and paste it in. I have template letters for jobsearch too. This is essential
reviews.author: Brian Day

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for about a year. I haven\'t fully explored most of its functions, but it\'s been great for making notes. Not slowed down by ads or anything. Good job :)
reviews.author: Caroline Richards
